name: A creepy necklace with a green eyeball
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence pathetically.
It has nice armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a good amount.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'nerve mastery'.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'iron will'.
